content:
I've added a new run-make test for #76256 that's failing in CI during linking. Failed once in (dist-powerpc-linux, ubuntu-latest-xl) with a segfault, and failed the next time in (dist-various-1, ubuntu-latest-xl) with arm-none-eabi-gcc: error: unrecognized command line option '-m64'.

I have a feeling I should be adding an ignore or only directive to the run-make makefile, or invoking rustc differently. Anyone know what needs to be done?
